name: web3.storage-lit-sdk
description: An integration of Web3 Storage and Lit Protocol

scripts.build:docs: documentation build src/integration.ts --parse-extension ts -f md -o documentation/integration.md --shallow && documentation build src/lit-helper.ts --parse-extension ts -f md -o documentation/lit-helper.md --shallow && documentation build src/web3.storage-helper.ts --parse-extension ts -f md -o documentation/web3.storage-helper.md --shallow && documentation build src/client.ts --parse-extension ts -f md -o documentation/client.md --shallow && doctoc README.md
